description: Seals of Quality represents the cream of the crop of Hawai`i's agricultural producers. Products with this seal are genuine, Hawai`i-grown or Hawai`i-made premium products, a guarantee that is enforced by the State of Hawai`i.

name: SEALS OF QUALITY
